rotate_blade.description: Rotate the blade of the knife to inspect it.

clean_rotation_blade.description: Clean the blade of the knife to ensure sharpness and hygiene.

inspect_knife_body.description: Check the body of the knife for any cracks or deformations.

clean_knife_body.description: Clean the body of the knife to ensure hygiene and a firm grip.

inspect_whole_knife.description: Inspect the entire knife, including the blade and body for any potential issues.

clean_whole_knife.description: Clean the entire knife including the blade and body for hygiene and maintenance.
